document.full_text: a ban on early broadcasting of election results that dates from the 1930s puts canada on a collision course with social media like twitter and facebook, making a scofflaw of anyone who tweets too soon.
document.title: twitter challenge: canada election rules face test
lines_and_colors: a ban on early broadcasting of election results that dates from the 1930s puts canada on a collision course with social media like twitter and facebook, making a scofflaw of anyone who tweets too soon.
